p:
As with the water chemistry, aliquots of water samples were divided as necessary and measured with standard methods outlined in Table 2 and described here. Chlorophyll a concentration was determined by filtering water sampled onto a glass fiber filter, extracting the chlorophyll a in 90% acetone for 4–24 h and measuring fluorescence with a Turner MODEL 10- AU fluorometer
47 (Turner Designs, Sunnyvale, CA, USA).
